basics.name: Andrew Weisbeck
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: Tar Heel Dev Studio
work.summary: Design, market, and develop full-stack applications and websites for small businesses and non-profits.
highlights: Manage entire web development studio's operations as owner and sole developer.
responsibilities: Created and manage five open-source projects that provide software dependencies and productivity tools.
Improved web app performance by 20% using Sentry and Open Replay for performance analysis.
Integrated third-party APIs to extend app functionality, enhancing user satisfaction scores by 35%.
Streamlined deployment process through Docker containerization, shortening release cycles by 50%.
Facilitated community feature adoption by contributing to open-source repositories, benefiting 5 projects.
achievements: Help clients double their website traffic with improved website performance,effective storytelling, and SEO.

work.name: Iron Range Cyber, formerly CyberOpz
work.summary: Responsible for monitoring endpoints, reporting any security incidents to senior SOC analysts, and investigating cyber forensics of any hacking attempt or breach of client assets.
highlights: Contributed to streamlining processes for a startup cyber security company. Reduced critical client security incidents 100% by catching any breaches of security early enough to prevent loss of assets and criticial information.
responsibilities:
Improved incident response rate by 15% by coordinating with SOC managers
and analyzing security events.
Managed over 100 security assessments using Nessus, Wireshark, and Metasploit tools.
Enhanced system security by evaluating and improving authentication methods by 20%.
Informed cyber defenders, ensuring threat awareness for 50 potential impacts.
Influenced cyber strategy for 5 clients by presenting clear technical solutions.
Reduced overall incident response time by 30%, optimizing threat detection processes using Malwarebytes, Witfoo, and IRIS.
achievements: Learned cybersecurity and was capable of all job functions within the first month of being hired.

work.name: WeisMind Studio
work.summary: Created multiple blogs and completed freelance writing assignments for over 50 clients.
highlights: Manage two newsletters that total over 500 monthly readers together.
Currently publishing content every day for the next 100 days.
Write about data structures and algorithms, system design, and other programming topics on Dev.to.
Use technical writing to create tutorials on next-gen technologies like Deno and Supabase.
Discover, review, and write about new tools and frameworks that assist other developers in creating apps.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize philanthropy events as a member of the Pi Kappa Alpha fraternity.
highlights: Collaborate with AXiD to put on the annual Nacho Feed Fundraising event that raises over $10,000 each event.

courses: MIS151 - Management of Information Systems and Supply Chain

projects.name: My Resume Site
projects.description: A resume website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS
Includes printable resume, keyboard commands, experience and skills section, and projects section.

projects.name: GeauxWeisbeck4.dev
projects.description: A personal portfolio website and dev journal for sharing my projects and a place where I can share developer resources and write about what I'm learning.
highlights: Built with React, Svelte, Astro, PostgreSQL, Strapi CMS, and Tailwind CSS
Third version of this website I've developed

projects.name: Django CFB Blog App
projects.description: A full-stack college football blog that I created with Django.
highlights: Built with Django, PostgreSQL, and Next.js
User authentication and CRUD operations

projects.name: Crossfit Workout of the Day API
projects.description: An API that allows users to pull a new workout from Crossfit WOD API.
highlights: Integrated with MongoDB Backend to store Crossfit workouts
Working on second version with new functionality

projects.name: Astro Garden Theme
projects.description: A starter template that allows developers to quickly build a digital garden with Astro.
highlights: Built with React, Astro, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
Developing a paid version with design system that includes more functionality

projects.name: Tar Heel Dev Studio Website
projects.description: Company Marketing Website and Landing Page
highlights: Google Lighthouse score of 100 in all categories
Actively maintain blog posts and other content for new visitors
Monitor and track user behavior and site performance with Sentry

projects.name: Geaux Tweet
projects.description: A Twitter knock-off clone that allows users to Tweet, like tweets, and login.
highlights: Full-stack application built with Supabase, Next.js, and TailwindCSS
Authentication login capabilities using Google, GitHub, and email

projects.name: Roadmap.sh Roadmaps and Projects
projects.description: Learning and sharpening programming skills with Roadmap.sh projects and roadmaps.
highlights: Completed HTML Single Page CV for Frontend Projects and working on completing all of them
Worked through Data Structures and Algorithms, JavaScript, and Python Roadmaps
